overview: The first stand-up comedy special by Paul Taylor, an Englishman who lived for several years in France as a child and therefore performs his shows 50% in the English and 50% in the French language. Here, he talks about a squirrel conspiracy, the French greeting culture and why queuing might no have been invented by the French.
tagline: Bonsoir, bonsoir! Comment ca va? Voulez vous coucher? Enchanté!
title: Paul Taylor - #Franglais
